Name: tiny & Tall: Gleipnir
About the game: tiny & Tall: Gleipnir, Part One is a classic yet modern point'n'click adventure, inspired by LucasArt's legendary titles. Two barely competent and charmingly inept blacksmiths find themselves contractually bound to the Norse gods and have to explore a lovingly handcrafted world in a quest for unusual and magical objects. But while they look for these ingredients, the sinister gaze of Loki, the Trickster god, casts an evil shadow on their path... Solve (not so) convoluted puzzles, talk to eccentric characters and discover an epic Norse legend! Old-school gameplay with a modern realization A pair of adorable characters, one slightly less so than the other Lots of jokes, almost none directed against the fourth wall More than 50 handpainted (on a computer) levels A unique soundtrack Scared of opaque point'n'clicks? This one's got an entirely optional clue system It is pixel art â€“ 1920*1080 of 'em
